message: I'll start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
I'll match your fair split, but I'll take a slight edge. Accept and we can end the game.
You wanted a slight edge? I'll give you a slight edge, but I'll keep a bit more.
You think you're giving me a slight edge? I'll take a bigger one this time.
You wanted a bigger edge? I'll give it to you, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
